description: Australia, Canada and Japan are included on the safe list, but the US and Brazil are not.
title: Coronavirus: EU to allow in visitors from 15 'safe' countries
title_page: Coronavirus: EU to allow in visitors from 15 'safe' countries - BBC News
maintext: In the EU discussions there were splits between those such as Spain - wanting the boost of tourism, but preferring to play safe because they have been hit so hard by Covid-19 - and others like Greece and Portugal, which depend on tourism but are less scarred by the virus.
